document_data.name: Lauratha Delrym
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|10}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 8: To Venerate The Great Mother}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lauratha Delrym''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] with the rank of Trueseed that resided in the [[Bounty of the Goddess (Voonlar)|Bounty of the Goddess]] temple in [[Voonlar]].
__NOTOC__
document_data.Description: Lauratha had dark hair and plain features.
document_data.Personality: She maintained a prim and proper decorum, choosing to be quiet and observant, which disguised her boundless curiosity about people and their activities.
document_data.Relationships: She knew everyone in Voonlar and kept up to date on how they spent their time.
